title: Sample, "MiniChek", 1940s–1960s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft
markings: Paper label attached to lower right corner, HERMAN MILLER FABRICS.
description: White and tan warp and weft with grey, brown and black supplementary wefts that form checks. Selvedge on 2 sides and cut on 2 sides.
